name: is-msgs
description: Protobuf messages for the IS framework

scripts.bundle: mkdir -p gen_js && cd protos && protoc --proto_path=. --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:../gen_js *.proto && ../node_modules/.bin/browserify ../gen_js/*.js  --standalone is_msgs > ../gen_js/is_msgs.js && ../node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs ../gen_js/is_msgs.js > ../gen_js/is_msgs_min.js

author: is
